section.title: xcfisb.inc
section.programlisting: 00001 * ------------------- Fission Fragments yield and neutron multiplicity - 00002 PARAMETER (MXFISB=100000,MAXIAP=60,MAXIZP=20) 00003 COMMON / XCFISB / IZAPNT(MAXIZP,MAXIAP,6), XFISB(MXFISB) 00004 INTEGER MFISB(MXFISB) 00005 EQUIVALENCE (MFISB,XFISB) 00006 * 00007 * IZAPNT pointer to information in XFISB 00008 * The pointer for a fissile isotope is obtained as: 00009 * IZF=IZ-85 00010 * IAF=IA-2*IZ 00011 * IZAPNT(IZF,IAF,1) pointer to the fission yield information in XFISB 00012 * IZAPNT(IZF,IAF,2) number of energies for fission yields 00013 * IZAPNT(IZF,IAF,3) number of isomers 00014 * IZAPNT(IZF,IAF,4) pointer to nu information in XFISB 00015 * IZAPNT(IZF,IAF,5) kind of information (1=polynomial, 2=tabulation) 00016 * IZAPNT(IZF,IAF,6) number of data 00017 * 00018 *-----------------------------------------------------------------------
